title: Dictionary to List | Challenge
description: In Python, a dictionary is a collection of key-value pairs. Sometimes, we may need to convert a dictionary to a list of tuples. In this challenge, you are tasked with writing a function that takes a dictionary as an argument and returns a list of tuples.

meta.title: Convert Dictionary to List in Python
meta.description: Learn how to convert a Python dictionary to a list of tuples in this programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: python, tuples, list, dictionary, data conversion

verify.name: Verify Python Script Execution in Temporary Directory

i18n.title: 字典转列表 | 挑战
i18n.description: 在Python中，字典是键值对的集合。有时，我们可能需要将字典转换为元组列表。在这个挑战中，你要编写一个函数，它以字典作为参数并返回一个元组列表。

meta.title: 在Python中把字典转换为列表
meta.description: 在本编程教程中学习如何将Python字典转换为元组列表。
meta.keywords: Python, 元组, 列表, 字典, 数据转换
